DOC.criteria: Written inform consent . Gestational age 37 0/7 41 6/7 week . Patients care roomingin , postnatal age 12 72 hour life . Adequate gestational age healthy infant . No painful stimulus study except Vitamine K injection soon birth . Interval last feeding 30 60 minute . Mothers use opioid gestation labor birth . Delivery general anesthesia . Apgar score less seven 1st 5th minute life . Neonates receive venous , arterial , capillary spinal puncture . Any congenital malformation CNS abnormality .
